attributes.action: Give Disabled and WCA a fair assessment from private firms and get rid of Atos
attributes.additional_details: doctors/consultants have more of a say as they know us better then a nurse for 20 minutes that's what we want capita and maximus to do but we all want Atos Healthcare not to carry out any more assessments for PIP/ESA, i can prove the nurse that did my assessment knew nothing about my condition so they shouldn't do the assessments there complaint policy is very poor, We want our voices heard as Iain Duncan Smith doesn't care about people who are ill as long as it saves money so please listen thanks
attributes.background: Atos Healthcare is the worse out of capita and maximus but we want a fair assessment by recording all assessment and have to sign the assessors notes as they lie and don't listen there unprofessional and cause a lot off distress also a doctor to carry out complex conditions assessments and let our
